segments.text: What's the matter with me , Doctor ? I feel so tired these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's your blood pressure , I'm afraid . It's far too high .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what's the cause of that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Overwork-amongst other things . You can't work 24 hours a day . You ' Ve got to slow down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I can't just slow down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've got to , I'm afraid . And look at this . You weigh 200 stones . That's too much for a man of your size .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean I've got to lose weight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You've got to cut down on bread and potatoes and take more exercise .
segments.speaker: S2
